pkgmetadata.longdescription: =======================Xmipp Metadata Handler=======================This package implements a Xmipp Metadata handling functionality with image binary accession in Python.==========================Included functionalities==========================- **XmippMetadata** class: Reading and writing of Xmipp Metadata files (.xmd)- **ImageHandler** class: Reading and writing of image binaries stored in the metadata. It support the following formats: - MRC files (reading and writing) for stacks and volumes (.mrcs and .mrc) - Spider files (reading and writing) for stacks and volumes (.stk and .vol)
